scripts.say: Oh my, how many times does this make now? Haven't these dullards learnt by now that their flying pieces of scrap metal are no match for our Zeros?
It looks like AF's enemies are capable of nothing more than scrabbling desperately at our feet. Hurry and prepare to launch our next wave of attacks on the island.
Akagi, I think we still have to keep track of the movement of enemy aircraft. It would be prudent to leave enough fighters on reserve...
What is there to fear? Tone's recon planes haven't found any of these "carriers." Perhaps they turned tail and ran at the sight of our mighty fleet?
After all, "they" are behind us, observing our glorious battle... ahaha!
